title: Marketplace Tech for Friday, December 5, 2014
teaser: Jonathan Zittrain, law professor and co-founder of Harvard’s Berkman Center for Internet and Society, talks about body-worn cameras and how technology might change the relationship between police officers and communities. And how well have you kept up with the week in tech news? This week, host Ben Johnson takes on with Rusty Foster, who writes the Today in Tabs newsletter for Silicon Tally.
description: Jonathan Zittrain, law professor and co-founder of Harvard’s Berkman Center for Internet and Society, talks about body-worn cameras and how technology might change the relationship between police officers and communities. And how well have you kept up with the week in tech news? This week, host Ben Johnson takes on with Rusty Foster, who writes the Today in Tabs newsletter for Silicon Tally.
